model.model: LGB MTS 22592 with onboard sound decoder

variable.tooltip: Sets the starting voltage at throttle speed step 1 - 0: slow, 255: maximum speed
variable.label: Starting voltage
Volt Partenza
V démarr.
Startspannung

variable.tooltip: Sets the acceleration rate - 1: rapid acceleration, 255: gradual acceleration
variable.label: Acceleration
Accellerazione (0-255)
Accelération (0-255)
Anfahrverzögerung (0-255)

variable.tooltip: Sets the deceleration rate - 1: rapid braking, 255: gradual braking)
variable.label: Braking
Decellerazione (1-255)
Décélération (1-255)
Bremszeit (1-255)

variable.tooltip: Sets the maximum voltage at full throttle - 1: slow, 255: maximum speed
variable.label: Maximum Motor Voltage
Volt Massimi (0-255):
Höchstgeschwindigkeit

variable.tooltip: Sets the motor drive frequency - Note: Back-EMF only works with 16 kHz
variable.label: Motor Frequency

variable.tooltip: (On if value set)
variable.label: F1 Function Output in Analog Mode

variable.tooltip: (On if value set)
variable.label: F2 Function Output in Analog Mode

variable.tooltip: (On if value set)
variable.label: F3 Function Output in Analog Mode

variable.tooltip: (On if value set)
variable.label: F4 Function Output in Analog Mode

variable.tooltip: (On if value set)
variable.label: F5 Function Output in Analog Mode

variable.tooltip: (On if value set)
variable.label: F6 Function Output in Analog Mode

variable.tooltip: Sets the speed step mode
variable.label: Speed Steps
Step Velocità

variable.tooltip: Determines whether loco will use manufacturer's internal or user-defined speed step table
variable.label: Use Speed Table
Usa Tabella velocità

variable.tooltip: Voltage for F1 terminal - 1:low voltage, 5:5V light bulbs or smoke generator, 32:maximum voltage
variable.label: Voltage for F1 terminal

variable.tooltip: Voltage for front, rear and interior light - 1:low voltage, 5:5V light bulbs, 32:maximum voltage
variable.label: Voltage for lighting terminals

variable.tooltip: Command which triggers the F1 terminal

enumChoice.choice: buttons 1-8 with fast pulse string (for 55021 with P-Update only)
lighting button (LGB=9, others=0) (on only when loco is reversing)
button 1 (on only when loco is reversing)
lighting button (LGB=9, others=0) (on only when loco is moving forward)
button 1 (on only when loco is moving forward)

variable.label: Command for F1 terminal

variable.tooltip: Command which triggers the front light terminal

enumChoice.choice: lighting button (LGB=9, others=0) (on only when loco is reversing)
button 1 (on only when loco is reversing)
lighting button (LGB=9, others=0) (on only when loco is moving forward)
button 1 (on only when loco is moving forward)

variable.label: Command for front lighting terminal

variable.tooltip: Command which triggers the rear light terminal

enumChoice.choice: lighting button (LGB=9, others=0) (on only when loco is reversing)
button 1 (on only when loco is reversing)
lighting button (LGB=9, others=0) (on only when loco is moving forward)
button 1 (on only when loco is moving forward)

variable.label: Command for rear lighting terminal

variable.tooltip: Determines if MTS hand-off is on or off
variable.label: hand-off function

variable.tooltip: Determines if digital back-EMF is on or off
variable.label: MTS Back-EMF

variable.tooltip: Determines if analog back-EMF is on or off
variable.label: analog Back-EMF

variable.tooltip: Determines if load dependent sound is on or off
variable.label: Load dependent sound

variable.tooltip: Determines if F1 is constant or flashing
variable.label: F1 output flashing

variable.tooltip: Determines if F2 is constant or flashing
variable.label: F2 output flashing

variable.tooltip: Determines if automatic brake sounds are on or off
variable.label: Automatic brake sounds

variable.tooltip: Check your loco's manual to determine use of this bit
variable.label: Loco dependent bit 8

variable.tooltip: Voltage for F2 terminal - 1:low voltage, 5:5V light bulbs or smoke generator, 32:maximum voltage
variable.label: Voltage for F2 terminal

variable.tooltip: Command which triggers the F2 terminal

enumChoice.choice: lighting button (LGB=9, others=0) (on only when loco is reversing)
button 1 (on only when loco is reversing)
lighting button (LGB=9, others=0) (on only when loco is moving forward)
button 1 (on only when loco is moving forward)

variable.label: Command for F2 terminal

variable.item: Pause Time between changes in direction
variable.tooltip: Pause equals programmed value x 0.5 seconds
variable.label: Pause Time between changes in direction

variable.tooltip: 1: small steps, 255: large steps (Note: LGB recommends not changing this CV)
variable.label: Back-EMF Maximum Adjustment Factor

variable.tooltip: 0: immediate adjustment, 255: maximum delay (Note: LGB recommends not changing this CV)
variable.label: Back-EMF Adjustment Frequency

variable.tooltip: 0: no adjustment, 255: maximum adjustment (Note: LGB recommends not changing this CV)
variable.label: Back-EMF Maximum Adjustment
